name: Happy Burning!
description:
Abstract
Phloggy has to burn it all to remain happy!
Mr. Cloud wants to keep the forest safe and wet..
Help Phloggy burn the whole world while avoiding Mr. Cloud's rain!

Goal

Phloggy burns everything in his path
Hug a tree to create a fireplace
fireplaces distract Mr. Cloud and lets you flee!

Controls

WASD/Arrows : Move phloggy

Mouse: Move camera

Thank you for trying out Happy Burning!
Apart from the skybox and the 3d model of the grass, all of the assets and music have been done during the jam!
